taʿruju al-malāikatu wal-rūḥu ilayhi fī yawmin kāna miq'dāruhu khamsīna alfa sanatin
yubaṣṣarūnahum yawaddu al-muj'rimu law yaftadī min ʿadhābi yawmi-idhin bibanīhi
waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma yunjīhi
wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
illā ʿalā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīna
famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
ayaṭmaʿu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yud'khala jannata naʿīmin
falā uq'simu birabbi al-mashāriqi wal-maghāribi innā laqādirūna
ʿalā an nubaddila khayran min'hum wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
fadharhum yakhūḍū wayalʿabū ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumu alladhī yūʿadūna
yawma yakhrujūna mina al-ajdāthi sirāʿan ka-annahum ilā nuṣubin yūfiḍūna
khāshiʿatan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun dhālika al-yawmu alladhī kānū yūʿadūna
